title: Can we say that one is a Companion / Friend of Allah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says can we say that one is a companion of allah azzawajal first of all it is not you who takes companions it's allah who takes companions so i could say i am a very knowledgeable person i know a lot of people i personally know the president of the this country i know the king of this country this is nothing i know them but they don't know me so there's no point in saying this when you say and claim that you are the companion of allah you are flattering yourself praising yourself what proof do you have so you don't claim that but allah may select among his servants someone to be a companion to him or khalil and this is why the prophet al-sassam said that if i were to take a dear friend and a close friend which means khalil i would have taken abu bakr but i am the khalil rahman i'm the close ally and friend of allah azzawajal so to us for us to claim that with allah is inappropriate and not permissible
